short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roll dice with four, six, eight, ten, twelve, and twenty sides. Add modifiers or advantage/disadvantage to each roll.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A virtual set of dice for any dice related event in your life. Add modifiers to your rolls or throw with an advantage/disadvantage for those harrowing D&D campaign scenarios. Roll multiple dice at once if that's what it takes. The choice is yours! Just make sure to save the best for those crucial saving throws.
